Sentencas: Carbon deposition characteristics of CO/CO2 fuel on an anode support button cell are investigated.
Titulo: Carbon deposition on nickel cermet anodes of solid oxide fuel cells operating on carbon monoxide fuel

Sentencas: The anodic carbon deposition degree increases with the discharging time, the operation temperature and the CO mole fraction in anode gas.
Titulo: Carbon deposition on nickel cermet anodes of solid oxide fuel cells operating on carbon monoxide fuel

Sentencas: The deposited carbon on the anode cross-sections is characterized by an X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy and a Raman spectrometer to analyze the differences and similarities of CO and CH4 deposited carbon microstructure.
Titulo: Carbon deposition on nickel cermet anodes of solid oxide fuel cells operating on carbon monoxide fuel

Sentencas: The carbon is mainly deposited on the Ni surface for CO while the deposited carbon consists of carbon on the Ni surface and carbonyl group C=O for CH4.
Titulo: Carbon deposition on nickel cermet anodes of solid oxide fuel cells operating on carbon monoxide fuel

Sentencas: Not similar to CH4, there is no obvious disordered carbon peak in the CO deposited carbon Raman spectra.
Titulo: Carbon deposition on nickel cermet anodes of solid oxide fuel cells operating on carbon monoxide fuel

Sentencas: The CO deposited carbon is mainly in regular crystal graphitic carbon structure and rarely in amorphous carbon structure.
Titulo: Carbon deposition on nickel cermet anodes of solid oxide fuel cells operating on carbon monoxide fuel
